select
from zuozhexinxi where zhanghao = #{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select count(*) from zuozhexinxi where 1=1 and zhanghao like concat('%',#{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingbie like concat('%',#{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and nianling >= concat('',#{nianling1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and nianling <= concat('',#{nianling2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shouji like concat('%',#{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenfenzheng like concat('%',#{shenfenzheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jianjie like concat('%',#{jianjie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select from zuozhexinxi where 1=1
and zhanghao =#{zhanghao}

select from zuozhexinxi where 1=1 and zhanghao like concat('%',#{zhanghao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingbie like concat('%',#{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and nianling >= concat('',#{nianling1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and nianling <= concat('',#{nianling2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'') and shouji like concat('%',#{shouji,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and shenfenzheng like concat('%',#{shenfenzheng,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and jianjie like concat('%',#{jianjie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}

insert into zuozhexinxi

zhanghao, mima, xingming, xingbie, nianling, shouji, shenfenzheng, jianjie,

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
